name: @align_partial_oblique
author: AFNI Developers
description: A script to align a full coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset to match a partial coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset. Alignment is done with a rotation and shift (6 parameters) transform only.

inputs.description: Partial coverage T1 weighted non-oblique dataset.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Output dataset name is formed by adding SUF to the prefix of the base dataset. The default suffix is _alnd_PartialCoverageObliqueT1
inputs.name: Suffix

inputs.description: Clean all temp files, likely left from -keep_tmp option then exit.
inputs.name: Clean temporary files flag

inputs.description: Cubic voxel size of output dataset in TLRC space Default MM is 1.
inputs.name: Cubic voxel size

inputs.description: Size of voxel in the x direction (Right-Left). Default is 1mm.
inputs.name: Voxel size in x direction

inputs.description: Size of voxel in the y direction (Anterior-Posterior). Default is 1mm.
inputs.name: Voxel size in y direction

inputs.description: Size of voxel in the z direction (Inferior-Superior). Default is 1mm.
inputs.name: Voxel size in z direction

output-files.description: Aligned partial coverage T1 weighted dataset
output-files.name: Aligned output file
